name: Life and Deathmatch
description:
Life and Deathmatch is a multiplayer shooter game, focusing on deathmatches. Other rulesets may be added during development. The game is in alpha state, so expect bugs and incomplete features.

Gameplay today MAY change  during development, but hey, it's a shooter. How much can change ?! :D

If you buy this game at this early state, you are helping me develop the game, and of course have access to all the updates and the full version when that is released.

You will also have a great opportunity to influence the development if you have some great ideas.
